Name: European Theatre Convention – Pilot Feedback Session
Title: European Theatre Convention – Pilot Feedback Session

Title: European Theatre Convention Core Training: Energy
Description: Join us for this Core Training on Energy: where does it come from and where does it go? What is the link with carbon and how can we save money by saving energy?

Title: Global Network Meeting: Networking for all Ki Futures Participants and the European Theatre Convention

Name: Core Training: Energy
Title: Core Training: Energy
Description: Energy! One of our largest carbon contributors and the invisible culprit. Join this Core Training to learn the difference between net-zero and carbon neutral, the energy hierarchy, and how to talk about your carbon reduction plan.

Title: European Theatre Convention Deep Dive Training: Sustainability in Conversation

Description:
The Anthropocene – an introduction 

\n

Name: European Theatre Convention Workshop: Champion Presentations
Title: European Theatre Convention Workshop: Champion Presentations
Description: Present your work, projects, ideas, and successes to your colleagues during this Global Network Meeting where Champions can showcase their sustainability journeys and invite peer-to-peer review and co-creation.

Name: Workshop: Developing Your Energy Baseline
Title: Workshop: Developing Your Energy Baseline

Name: European Theatre Convention Pilot Finale
Title: European Theatre Convention Pilot Finale

Description: Welcome to Ki Futures! We are so excited to start this journey with you. Join us to find out more about what you can expect from Ki Futures and how to start seeing everything with a sustainability lens.

Name: European Theatre Convention Ki Futures Launch! Global Network Meeting
Title: European Theatre Convention Ki Futures Launch! Global Network Meeting
Description: Welcome to Ki Futures! Join us to find out more about the program and what to expect over the three month Pilot.

Title: European Theatre Convention Core Training: Introduction to Sustainability for Culture
Description:

Description: We welcome Jessica Litwak, Director of the H.E.A.T. initiative and expert in theatre for social change and community engagement to teach us how to engage our audiences and be effective change makers with our communities.
